dashboardDescription: When a new stamp is issues, reward is collected, or customer joins it will appear here. Click the QR button to issue a stamp or verify a reward.

terms.usage: To continue using gobonki, please review and accept our legal terms.
terms.agreeContact: I agree to be contacted by gobonki for product updates and promotions.
terms.agreeTerms: By clicking continue, you agree to the gobonki's <terms>Terms of Service</terms> & <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

mapsLegalOverlay.description: This content is not displayed because you have not accepted the integration of third-party content.
mapsLegalOverlay.terms: Information on data processing by gobonki and third parties in connection with third-party content can be found in the <privacy>gobonki Privacy Policy</privacy>
